archimate:BusinessObject.name: ServiceSpecificationRole
archimate:BusinessObject.documentation:
This is an abstract base class that defines a ServiceSpecification in terms of a set of roles. The roles are then used to characterize the invariant functionality of the Service, regardless of whether it is a resource- or a customer-facing service.
ServiceSpecificationRoles represent the invariant functionality of a Service. Representing a Service in terms of ServiceSpecificationRoles enables the functionality of the Service to be defined independently of BusinessActor, PhysicalResource, LogicalResource, or other Services.
Please see the DEN-ng Service model for more details.
